bibl.title: Φιλέλλην.
bibl.note: Discusses P. Stras. Inv. W.G. 307 verso, I, 30-II, 3 (= Pack2 1698) = C.G.F.P. 300 (a). - The papyrus (P. Stras. WG 304-307). - Text. - Style, genre, content. The text describes probably the good Greek mercenary, a sympathetic soldier in a comedy.
bibl.seg: Discusses P. Stras. Inv. W.G. 307 verso, I, 30-II, 3 (= Pack2 1698) = C.G.F.P. 300 (a). - The papyrus (P. Stras. WG 304-307). - Text. - Style, genre, content. The text describes probably the good Greek mercenary, a sympathetic soldier in a comedy.
